documentation.content: Alerts when usage reaches 80%. [View and edit quotas](https://console.cloud.google.com/iam-admin/quotas?${URL_PARAMS})

conditions.displayName: Usage nearing per-minute rate quota limit

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query: fetch ${MONITORED_RESOURCE}| filter ${OUTER_FILTER}| {metric ${METRIC_USAGE_TYPE}| filter ${QUOTA_USAGE_FILTER}${OPTIONAL_USAGE_QUERY}| align delta_gauge(1m)| group_by [${GROUPING}], sum(value.net_usage); metric ${METRIC_LIMIT_TYPE}| filter ${QUOTA_LIMIT_FILTER} | group_by [${GROUPING}],sliding(1m), .min}| ratio| every 1m| condition gt(val(), 0.8 '1')
